banner.title: Web Developer
banner.description: I craft reliable, delightful web experiences.

introduction.heading: Professional Introduction
paragraphs: I'm a Software Engineer specializing in building fast, reliable, and delightful web applications.
I enjoy crafting clean, scalable frontends with React/Next.js and thoughtful UX, and I collaborate closely with teams to ship features that matter.

experiences.description: Leading the development of scalable web applications with React, Next.js, and Node.js. Mentoring engineers and driving best practices.
Built end‑to‑end product features across the stack. Focused on performance, accessibility, and DX improvements.
Shipped UI components and design systems with React, Tailwind, and Storybook; collaborated closely with design and product teams.

educations.description: Graduated with honors. Specialized in Web Engineering and Human‑Computer Interaction.

projects.name: Portfolio Starter
projects.description: A lightweight portfolio template using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components.

projects.name: Motion Gallery
projects.description: Image gallery with smooth animations powered by Framer Motion and optimized images.

projects.name: API Toolkit
projects.description: Reusable API client with type‑safe endpoints and caching utilities.

feedbacks.name: Jane Doe
feedbacks.feedback: Rommel consistently delivered high‑quality features on time and communicated clearly throughout the project.

feedbacks.name: John Smith
feedbacks.feedback: Great developer experience focus. Our frontend performance improved noticeably after his refactors.

feedbacks.name: Maria Garcia
feedbacks.feedback: Professional and thoughtful. Loved the attention to accessibility and details in UI interactions.
